1: Ahmedabad: Hiroshi Suzuki, the Japanese ambassador to India, was the chief guest at the 11th Japan Festival (Nihon Matsuri) at Ahmedabad Management Association (AMA) on Saturday. Talking to TOI on the sidelines of the event, Suzuki remembered his first visit to the state in 2017 when PM Modi invited the then Japanese PM Shinzo Abe to the city and laid foundation to the bullet train. Suzuki was a close associate of Abe for over 15 years.
